comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: The Success was a floating museum which "the horrors of penal transportation in Great Britain and the United States of America between the 1890s and the 1930s." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Success_(prison_ship)

comment.author: 32105065@N04
comment._content: There is actually a man in the right end of the picture. How cool. I only saw him there after staring for quite a while.

comment.author: 90719112@N00
comment._content: If want to learn in more detail about, and see many more photos of this extraordinary vessel, check out my website and blog. I have researched this ship for over 40 years. Rich Norgard www.shipsuccess.com www.shipsuccess.blogspot.com
